name: obsidian-kadi4mat-sync
description: Sync Obsidian notes with Kadi4Mat scientific data repository

scripts.dev: DEV_VAULT=../obsidian-dev-vault node esbuild.config.mjs production && DEV_VAULT=../obsidian-dev-vault node copy-assets.mjs production
scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-assets.mjs production
scripts.build-fast: node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-assets.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Your Name
